name: Rose Sugar Shimmer Lip Tint
description:
Rose Sugar Shimmer Lip Tint

This color is just perfect for a healthy pink/peach shimmer with a touch of warming gold. This a very beautiful extreme shimmer and shine stix that will enhance any look you're going for in an all natural formula. Perfect for everyday at work, home or play.

Looking for an extreme shimmer and shine in one? You've just found it :) Shimmer Stix glide on super smooth with no waxy feel. Made with Avocado and Jojoba oils, they provide tons of shimmer and shine to your lips. Wear alone for a light tint with plenty of shimmer or wear it over my Lip Tintx for a big burst of shimmer and shine with more tint.


Why not pair this up with one of my Sugary Lip Scrubs? 

Just put one in your purse or in your pocket and you are good to go!

Feels GRAPE on lips and makes lips feel GRAPE!

This listing is for 1 Shimmer Stick and contains approximately .07oz

For a larger selection and more than 200 flavors of lip balm please visit me in my direct shop: www.ForGoodnessGrape.com

name: Marilyn Lip Tint
description:
Marilyn Lip Tint - Tinted Lip Balm - Sexy Red

This is a beautiful Lip Tintx in my series of color for lips dedicated to the beautiful women in films from the 30’s to the 50’s. Twenty years of great movies. Also known as the blonde bombshell, Marilyn is one of the most famous female actresses ever and is known everywhere for her bubbly personality, blonde hair and of course those red lips which I’m duplicating here in a color that she was most photographed in.

My Lip Tintx are very moisturizing, long lasting and provide a great tint of color to your lips with minerals, mica, and pigment. Feels like a lip balm, wears like a lip balm, but with a great tinted payout! My recipe has true staying power with superior moisture! Lip Tintx give your lips a nice tinted shine, moisture, and protection from the elements. What more could you want for your lips?

Why not pair this up with one of my Sugary Lip Scrubs? 

Just put one in your purse or in your pocket and you are good to go! 

Feels GRAPE on lips and makes lips feel GRAPE! 

This listing is for 1 Lip Tintx and contains approximately .15 oz

For a larger selection and more than 200 flavors of lip balm please visit me in my direct shop: www.ForGoodnessGrape.com

name: Gummy Bear Sugar Lip Scrub
description:
Gummy Bear Sugary Lip Scrub - Lip Scrub - Exfoliating Sugar Lip Scrub

And who doesn't love gummy bears? This delightful sugary lip scrub tastes like cramming hundreds of lovable, gooey gummy bears right into your mouth.

Your lips should be kissable, soft and silky smooth after the first treatment. A tubed lip scrub will provide you with many applications so I recommend using it weekly to keep you lips soft and smooth. A delicious way to smooth and soften lips.

Why not pair this up with one of my Lip Balms?  

How to use a lip scrub in a tube:
Hold the tube as if you were going to apply lip balm. Then gently rub the product across your lips in a circular and back and forth motion paying particular attention to dry and flaky areas. When you're done you can rinse or use a tissue to remove the sugar from your lips or it's totally safe and more YUMMY to just lick it off. Complete your treatment by applying a good lip balm immediately after exfoliating which will nourish and moisturize the newly exposed skin on your lips. Super fast and easy.

This listing is for 1 Sugary Lip Scrub and contains approximately .15 oz

For a larger selection and more than 200 flavors of lip balm please visit me in my direct shop: www.ForGoodnessGrape.com

name: Unicorn Kisses Lip Balm
description:
What would a unicorn kiss taste like? I know. It's a sweet blend of cotton candy and blue raspberry. A must try!

ForGoodnessGrape lip balms give your lips a nice clear shine, superior moisture, and protection from the elements. Pamper your lips with the super soft and buttery feel of ForGoodnessGrape lip balms. Try layering different flavors for a whole new experience.

name: Lemon Cupcake Lip Balm
description:
